message.content:
Validate the "Buy License" button implementation in the CEP login modal.

Check these files:
1. `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/panel/index.html` - Look for the loginModal div and verify:
   - There's a "Buy License" link/button after the Activate button
   - It links to "https://splice.video/pricing"
   - It has target="_blank" 
   - It has class "btn-buy-license"
   - There's a divider with "Don't have a license?" text

2. `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/panel/css/style.css` - Verify:
   - `.login-divider` class exists with proper styling (flex, centered text, border lines)
   - `.btn-buy-license` class exists with gradient styling (#00D4FF colors)
   - Hover state exists for the button

Report: PASS or FAIL with specific details on what was found or missing.
